basics.name: Kristen Yee
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A in Management Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2021

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Assist staff with clerical duties. Scanning, filing, mail sorting, update spreadsheets, run errands, etc.
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Product preparation, cash handling, maintaining store appearance, providing great customer service
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Kapiolani Medical Center for Women and Children
highlights: Interact with young patients in the hospital playroom
Organize playroom, wipe down toys, tabletop surfaces, etc.
